name: Brain Freeze (Maker School)
description: Once upon a time in stone age there live a monster (the run away monster, TRAM) don't  judge him by his name. OK, one day TRAM was living out in the open in the middle of the jungle then suddenly a ferocious ice fire rose upon the jungle! The TRAM sprinted into a cave and was held there for years and years. But the ice fire was still alight, help TRAM stay alive. Use up, down, right, left keys to move and most importantly,  HAVE FUN!!
